6 reasons why MoviePass sucks

by Dustin Triplett | Jan 2, 2015 | Editorials | 0 comments

Just before my holiday festivities commenced, I wrote an editorial called “6 reasons why MoviePass sucks”, which highlights the main reasons why the MoviePass subscription is a load of crap and not worth anyone’s time or money. You can give it a read over on Geekenstein.
